amendment.description: To provide funding for statewide, longitudinal data systems under section 208 of the Education Sciences Reform Act of 2002.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1621 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1621 proposed by Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11309, S11311; text: CR S11309) To provide funding for statewide, longitudinal data systems under section 208 of the Education Sciences Reform Act of 2002.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1621 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1621 proposed by Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 1542.
